item.title: OpenEBS NDM, go-to solution for managing Kubernetes Local Storage
Uniquely identifying disks in OpenEBS on VMWare platform
OpenEBS Node Device Management (NDM) - Troubleshooting tips
Configuring OpenEBS to run with Security-Enhanced Linux
My First Skydive experience.
item.description: Everything you love is on the other side of maximum fear Skydive Dubai is known for its safest tandem jump with an awesome view of Palm Jumeirah, though a bit expensive compared to other Drop zones. Skydiving was one of the activity that I had decided to do before I leave Dubai. And today I did it. Me and my collegue Jesvin (who also happens to be my Team lead at office :D) made bookings in Skydive Dubai for the morning slot at 10:45 AM.

Personal 👨 2021 Tag-Push github action📦🐬 : Github Action to retag and push multiplatform container images to multiple remote registries. 2018 Dooth 📱 : A secret messenger for Amazon Alexa. Easy Dialer 📞🇦🇪 : A calling card automation app to be used in UAE. 2017 Castle 🏰 : An open source implementation of the famous Google foobar challenge. Built out of inspiration from friends who couldn’t secure an invitation to the challenge.
